lead_paragraph: Budapest, Los Angeles and Paris have expressed confidence in their ability to control costs as they prepare for the final phase of bidding for the 2024 Summer Olympics, unworried by steep overruns at next host Tokyo.

headline.print_headline: 2024 Bid Cities Upbeat on Costs as Tokyo Struggles
headline.main: 2024 Bid Cities Upbeat on Costs as Tokyo Struggles

snippet: Budapest, Los Angeles and Paris have expressed confidence in their ability to control costs as they prepare for the final phase of bidding for the 2024 Summer Olympics, unworried by steep overruns at next host Tokyo....
